title: Nick Scarpino Is James Bond (Kinda) - The PlayStation VR Show
description:
In the season finale of The PlayStation VR Show, Agent 0069 Nick Scarpino jumps into the world of I Expect You to Die!

Shout-out to https://twitter.com/16BitsOfAwesome for the thumbnail!

Keep the lights on and get every episode a week early: http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Hey, FTC, PlayStation sent us this PSVR unit for review. Maybe even the game.

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
